tasks.title: Setup Project Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the project with Next.js, Prisma, and PostgreSQL.
tasks.details: Set up a new Next.js project using TypeScript. Configure Prisma ORM with a PostgreSQL database hosted on Railway or Supabase. Ensure the environment is ready for development with all necessary dependencies installed.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project setup by running a basic server and connecting to the database. Ensure Prisma migrations are applied successfully.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project with TypeScript
subtasks.description: Create a new Next.js project using TypeScript.
subtasks.details: Run 'npx create-next-app@latest --typescript' to set up the project.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify project structure and TypeScript configuration.

subtasks.title: Install and Configure Prisma ORM
subtasks.description: Set up Prisma ORM for database management.
subtasks.details: Install Prisma with 'npm install prisma' and initialize with 'npx prisma init'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check Prisma setup by running 'npx prisma generate'.

subtasks.title: Set Up PostgreSQL Database on Railway or Supabase
subtasks.description: Create and configure a PostgreSQL database.
subtasks.details: Use Railway or Supabase to host the PostgreSQL database and update the connection string in .env.
subtasks.testStrategy: Connect to the database using Prisma and verify connection.

subtasks.title: Configure Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Set up environment variables for database connection and other configurations.
subtasks.details: Add necessary variables to the .env file, including DATABASE_URL for Prisma.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure all environment variables are correctly loaded and accessible.

subtasks.title: Verify Project Setup and Run Basic Server
subtasks.description: Test the initial setup by running the server and checking database connectivity.
subtasks.details: Run 'npm run dev' to start the server and test database connection with a basic query.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure server runs without errors and database queries execute successfully.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication & Role Management
tasks.description: Develop a secure authentication system with role-based access for therapists and clients.
tasks.details: Use NextAuth.js with a credentials provider to handle user authentication. Implement role-based access controls to differentiate between therapist and client dashboards. Ensure secure session management with tokens.
tasks.testStrategy: Test registration and login flows for both roles. Verify that role-based access controls are enforced on all routes.

subtasks.title: Set Up NextAuth.js with Credentials Provider
subtasks.description: Integrate NextAuth.js for user authentication using credentials provider.
subtasks.details: Install NextAuth.js and configure it to use a credentials provider for authentication. Set up necessary environment variables and initial configuration files.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test basic login and logout flows using mock credentials.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Access Controls
subtasks.description: Develop role-based access controls to differentiate between therapist and client dashboards.
subtasks.details: Define roles and permissions in the application. Implement middleware to check user roles and restrict access to specific routes based on user roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test access restrictions by attempting to access therapist routes as a client and vice versa.

subtasks.title: Develop Therapist Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create a dashboard interface for therapists with role-specific features.
subtasks.details: Design and implement the therapist dashboard, ensuring it includes all necessary features and data views specific to therapists.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that only users with therapist roles can access the dashboard and that all features are functional.

subtasks.title: Develop Client Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create a dashboard interface for clients with role-specific features.
subtasks.details: Design and implement the client dashboard, ensuring it includes all necessary features and data views specific to clients.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that only users with client roles can access the dashboard and that all features are functional.

subtasks.title: Ensure Secure Session Management
subtasks.description: Implement secure session management using tokens.
subtasks.details: Configure NextAuth.js to use secure tokens for session management. Ensure tokens are stored securely and refreshed appropriately.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test session persistence across different devices and browsers. Verify token expiration and renewal processes.

tasks.title: Develop Transcript Input & Session Management
tasks.description: Create functionality for uploading and managing therapy session transcripts.
tasks.details: Implement file upload and text paste options for transcripts. Associate each transcript with a specific client and session date. Ensure transcripts are stored securely with encryption at rest.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file uploads and text pasting for various transcript formats. Verify that transcripts are correctly associated with clients and sessions.

subtasks.title: Design Transcript Upload Interface
subtasks.description: Create a user interface for uploading transcripts via file or text input.
subtasks.details: Design a simple UI allowing users to upload transcripts either by selecting a file or pasting text directly into a text area.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test UI with different file types and text inputs.

subtasks.title: Implement File Upload Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop backend logic to handle file uploads securely.
subtasks.details: Use a secure file handling library to process and store uploaded files. Ensure files are encrypted at rest.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test file upload with various file sizes and types.

subtasks.title: Develop Text Paste Handling
subtasks.description: Create functionality to process and store pasted transcript text.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to capture and store text input securely, ensuring encryption at rest.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test text input with different transcript lengths and formats.

subtasks.title: Associate Transcripts with Clients and Sessions
subtasks.description: Link each transcript to a specific client and session date.
subtasks.details: Develop a database schema to associate transcripts with client IDs and session dates. Ensure data integrity and consistency.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify correct association of transcripts with client and session data.

subtasks.title: Ensure Secure Storage of Transcripts
subtasks.description: Implement encryption for stored transcripts to ensure security.
subtasks.details: Use encryption libraries to encrypt transcripts at rest. Ensure compliance with data protection standards.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test encryption and decryption processes for data integrity.

tasks.title: Create Therapist Impressions Input Form
tasks.description: Develop a form for therapists to input clinical impressions before AI analysis.
tasks.details: Design a structured form capturing presenting concerns, key highlights, themes, goals, suspected diagnoses, modality considerations, risk observations, strengths, and session quality notes. Ensure impressions are saved and timestamped before AI generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form submission and data persistence. Verify that all fields are captured correctly and that the workflow prevents skipping this step.

subtasks.title: Design Form Layout
subtasks.description: Create a layout for the therapist impressions input form.
subtasks.details: Design a structured form layout capturing all required fields such as presenting concerns, key highlights, themes, goals, suspected diagnoses, modality considerations, risk observations, strengths, and session quality notes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the form layout to ensure all fields are included and correctly labeled.

subtasks.title: Implement Form Fields
subtasks.description: Develop the input fields for the form based on the design.
subtasks.details: Implement input fields for each section of the form using appropriate HTML elements. Ensure fields are user-friendly and accessible.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each field for correct input handling and accessibility compliance.

subtasks.title: Add Save and Timestamp Functionality
subtasks.description: Ensure that the form data is saved and timestamped before AI generation.
subtasks.details: Implement functionality to save form data to the database with a timestamp. Ensure data integrity and security.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data saving and timestamping by submitting the form and verifying database entries.

subtasks.title: Integrate with AI Analysis Workflow
subtasks.description: Connect the form submission to the AI analysis process.
subtasks.details: Ensure that the saved impressions are correctly passed to the AI analysis module. Verify the workflow integration.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the integration by submitting the form and checking if the data is correctly processed by the AI module.

subtasks.title: Conduct End-to-End Testing
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing of the entire form workflow.
subtasks.details: Conduct end-to-end testing to ensure the form captures all data correctly, saves it, and integrates with the AI analysis. Verify that no steps can be skipped.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform user testing to simulate real-world usage and ensure all functionalities work as expected.

tasks.title: Integrate GPT-4 for AI-Powered Treatment Plan Generation
tasks.description: Set up GPT-4 integration to generate treatment plans from transcripts.
tasks.details: Use the OpenAI GPT-4 API to parse transcripts and generate structured treatment plans. Ensure the AI operates independently of therapist impressions. Implement error handling and retry logic for API calls.
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI output for various transcript inputs. Validate JSON schema of AI-generated plans and handle API errors gracefully.

subtasks.title: Set Up GPT-4 API Access
subtasks.description: Configure access to the OpenAI GPT-4 API for treatment plan generation.
subtasks.details: Obtain API keys and configure authentication for secure access to the GPT-4 API.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API access with a simple request to ensure connectivity.

subtasks.title: Develop Transcript Parsing Module
subtasks.description: Create a module to parse transcripts for input into GPT-4.
subtasks.details: Implement a parser that extracts relevant information from transcripts for AI processing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate parsing accuracy with sample transcripts.

subtasks.title: Implement Treatment Plan Generation Logic
subtasks.description: Develop logic to generate structured treatment plans using GPT-4.
subtasks.details: Use the GPT-4 API to generate treatment plans from parsed transcript data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test plan generation with various transcript inputs and verify output structure.

subtasks.title: Integrate Error Handling and Retry Logic
subtasks.description: Add error handling and retry mechanisms for API calls.
subtasks.details: Implement robust error handling and retry logic to manage API call failures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate API errors and test retry logic effectiveness.

subtasks.title: Validate AI Independence from Therapist Impressions
subtasks.description: Ensure AI-generated plans are independent of therapist input.
subtasks.details: Verify that the AI operates without bias from therapist impressions, focusing solely on transcript data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Compare AI outputs with and without therapist impressions to ensure independence.

tasks.title: Develop Compare & Merge Workflow
tasks.description: Implement a side-by-side comparison of therapist impressions and AI analysis.
tasks.details: Create a UI to display therapist impressions alongside AI output. Highlight alignments and divergences. Allow therapists to merge and edit content from both sources into a final treatment plan.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the comparison view with various scenarios. Verify that therapists can merge and edit content correctly.

subtasks.title: Design UI for Side-by-Side Comparison
subtasks.description: Create a user interface to display therapist impressions alongside AI analysis.
subtasks.details: Design the layout to show therapist impressions and AI output side by side, ensuring clear visibility of both.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify UI displays both sources correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement Highlighting of Alignments and Divergences
subtasks.description: Develop functionality to highlight alignments and divergences between therapist and AI content.
subtasks.details: Use color coding to highlight matching and differing sections between the two sources.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with sample data to ensure highlights are accurate.

subtasks.title: Enable Content Merging and Editing
subtasks.description: Allow therapists to merge and edit content from both sources into a final treatment plan.
subtasks.details: Provide editing tools for therapists to combine and modify content from both sources.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure therapists can edit and merge content seamlessly.

subtasks.title: Develop Backend Logic for Content Management
subtasks.description: Create backend logic to handle the storage and retrieval of merged content.
subtasks.details: Implement APIs to save and retrieve the final treatment plan securely.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoints for data integrity and security.

subtasks.title: Conduct User Testing with Therapists
subtasks.description: Perform user testing to gather feedback on the compare and merge workflow.
subtasks.details: Organize sessions with therapists to test the workflow and gather usability feedback.
subtasks.testStrategy: Collect feedback and make necessary adjustments based on user input.

tasks.title: Generate Dual-View Treatment Plans
tasks.description: Create therapist-facing and client-facing versions of treatment plans.
tasks.details: Develop functionality to generate clinical and accessible versions of treatment plans. Ensure the client view is generated from the approved therapist plan and is not visible until therapist approval.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the generation of both views. Verify readability and accuracy of the client-facing plan.

subtasks.title: Design Data Model for Treatment Plans
subtasks.description: Create a data model to support dual-view treatment plans.
subtasks.details: Define database schema to store therapist and client versions of treatment plans.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review schema design with team.

subtasks.title: Develop Therapist Plan Generation
subtasks.description: Implement functionality to generate therapist-facing plans.
subtasks.details: Create backend logic to generate detailed clinical plans for therapists.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify plan generation with sample data.

subtasks.title: Implement Client Plan Generation
subtasks.description: Develop functionality to generate client-facing plans from therapist plans.
subtasks.details: Ensure client plans are derived from approved therapist plans and are simplified for accessibility.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test client plan generation for accuracy and readability.

subtasks.title: Create Approval Workflow for Plans
subtasks.description: Develop a workflow for therapists to approve plans before client access.
subtasks.details: Implement a system where therapists can review and approve plans before they are visible to clients.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test approval process to ensure only approved plans are visible.

subtasks.title: Integrate Plan Views into System
subtasks.description: Integrate the dual-view plans into the existing system architecture.
subtasks.details: Ensure seamless integration of both plan views into the application, maintaining role-based access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test integration with user roles to verify access control.

tasks.title: Build Therapist Dashboard
tasks.description: Create a central hub for therapists to manage clients, sessions, and plans.
tasks.details: Develop a dashboard interface for therapists to view client lists, session histories, and treatment plans. Include functionality to upload transcripts and trigger plan generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard navigation and functionality. Verify that all features are accessible and perform as expected.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Interface
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and design the UI for the therapist dashboard.
subtasks.details: Develop wireframes for the dashboard layout, including sections for client lists, session histories, and treatment plans.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review design with stakeholders for feedback.

subtasks.title: Implement Client List View
subtasks.description: Develop the functionality to display a list of clients on the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Fetch client data from the database and display it in a sortable and searchable table format.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test client list display and search functionality.

subtasks.title: Develop Session History Feature
subtasks.description: Create a section to view session histories for each client.
subtasks.details: Implement a detailed view of past sessions, including dates, notes, and outcomes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify session history accuracy and navigation.

subtasks.title: Add Treatment Plan Management
subtasks.description: Enable therapists to view and manage treatment plans.
subtasks.details: Integrate treatment plan data and allow for updates and approvals within the dashboard.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test treatment plan updates and approval workflow.

subtasks.title: Integrate Transcript Upload Functionality
subtasks.description: Allow therapists to upload session transcripts directly from the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Implement file upload and text paste options, linking transcripts to specific sessions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test transcript upload and association with sessions.

tasks.title: Build Client Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a client-friendly view of treatment plans and progress.
tasks.details: Create a dashboard for clients to view their treatment plans, goals, and homework. Ensure privacy disclaimers are visible and that clients can only see approved plans.
tasks.testStrategy: Test client dashboard access and content visibility. Verify that clients can view their plans and progress clearly.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Layout
subtasks.description: Create a wireframe for the client dashboard layout.
subtasks.details: Design a user-friendly layout for displaying treatment plans, goals, and homework.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review wireframe with stakeholders.

subtasks.title: Implement Treatment Plan Display
subtasks.description: Develop the section to display client treatment plans.
subtasks.details: Code the UI components to show treatment plans, ensuring only approved plans are visible.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify treatment plans display correctly.

subtasks.title: Add Privacy Disclaimers
subtasks.description: Ensure privacy disclaimers are visible on the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Implement a section for privacy disclaimers, ensuring they are prominent and clear.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check visibility and clarity of disclaimers.

subtasks.title: Develop Goals and Homework Sections
subtasks.description: Create sections for displaying client goals and homework.
subtasks.details: Implement UI components to show goals and homework, ensuring data is fetched securely.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data retrieval and display for goals and homework.

subtasks.title: Test Client Dashboard Functionality
subtasks.description: Conduct end-to-end testing of the client dashboard.
subtasks.details: Perform comprehensive testing to ensure all components function as expected and data is secure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard access, content visibility, and data security.

tasks.title: Implement Safety & Crisis Detection
tasks.description: Develop functionality to flag high-risk language in transcripts.
tasks.details: Use keyword and phrase pattern matching, followed by GPT-4 contextual analysis, to detect crisis language. Display flags prominently in the therapist view and ensure no concerning content is suppressed.
tasks.testStrategy: Test detection with various transcript scenarios, including high-risk cases. Verify that flags are accurate and visible to therapists.

subtasks.title: Research Keyword and Phrase Patterns
subtasks.description: Identify keywords and phrases indicative of crisis language.
subtasks.details: Compile a list of keywords and phrases that are commonly associated with crisis situations. This will serve as the basis for initial pattern matching.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review and validate the list with subject matter experts.

subtasks.title: Implement Keyword Pattern Matching
subtasks.description: Develop the logic to detect keywords in transcripts.
subtasks.details: Create a function to scan transcripts for the identified keywords and phrases, flagging any matches for further analysis.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with sample transcripts to ensure keywords are detected accurately.

subtasks.title: Integrate GPT-4 for Contextual Analysis
subtasks.description: Use GPT-4 to analyze flagged transcript sections for context.
subtasks.details: Set up GPT-4 API to analyze sections of transcripts flagged by keyword matching, determining if they truly indicate a crisis.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with transcripts containing both crisis and non-crisis language to verify contextual accuracy.

subtasks.title: Develop Therapist View for Flag Display
subtasks.description: Create UI components to display flags in the therapist dashboard.
subtasks.details: Design and implement UI elements that clearly display flagged sections in the therapist's view, ensuring visibility and clarity.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing with therapists to ensure flags are visible and understandable.

subtasks.title: Ensure No Content Suppression
subtasks.description: Verify that no concerning content is suppressed during analysis.
subtasks.details: Review the entire detection and display process to ensure all flagged content is presented to therapists without suppression.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform end-to-end testing with various transcripts to confirm all flagged content is shown.
